goal.en: ERP system is a very important tool to support internal daily operation of enterprise such as Sales and Distribution, Material Management, Purchasing, Production Planning, Financial Accounting and Controlling. This course will focus on SAP Financial Accounting module, but also will introduce the related integration with logistic modules for Material Management, Sales and Distribution.

outline.en: Course content will be published by teacher
